# CritHit Website Project Instructions

This is a basic website project with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. meant for a FRC robotics team to showcase their team information, achievements, and updates.

## Project Structure
- `/css/` - Stylesheets
- `/js/` - JavaScript files
- `/images/` - Image assets
- `index.html` - Main HTML file
- `README.md` - Project documentation
- `/referenceImages/` - Reference images for design

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Follow modern CSS practices
- Keep JavaScript modular and clean
- Optimize for performance and accessibility
- main color scheme: #00c1c1 (vivid cyan), #fbca13 (yellow), #f10101 (vivid red), #0000 (black for text only)
- info on robotics team: https://www.thebluealliance.com/team/10101
## Local Development
Open `index.html` in a browser or use VS Code Live Server extension for development.
